# idsec_identity_role_admin_rights (Resource)

The Identity service role admin rights resource that is used to manage role admin rights.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "idsec_identity_role_admin_rights" "myrole_admin_rights" {
  role_id = idsec_identity_role.myrole.role_id
  admin_rights = [
    "ServiceRight/dpaShowTile"
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `admin_rights` (List of String) Admin rights to add to the role

### Optional

- `role_id` (String) Role id to add admin rights to
- `role_name` (String) Role name to add admin rights to
